subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: The plugin Dila allows any site to get informations about their users rights and administrative processes.
This information is delivered by Dila (Direction de l'Information LÃ©gale et Administrative) in the form of XML streams.

subsection.name: Features
subsection.p:
This plugin offers different features to display the XML streams coming from Dila, or to modify them :
Display national cards and folders (XML streams)
Display local cards and folders
Manage stylesheets used to display local and national cards
Add complementary data to national cards
Create and modify local cards or folders
Indexing local and national cards to find them through the site search engine
